column1: Uchi////The part that always stays with me
column3: is how passionate each server is about each dish. Without fail
column4: you will get several people running food to your table
column5: and each will present it with the flawless aplomb of a museum tour guide expounding upon the virtues of the work of art in front of you. I love that
column6: and it's definitely what sets Uchi apart from the crowded dining scene in Houston.
